title: Science Simulation Instructional Design Based on Cognitive Task Analysis

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Science education environment emphasizing experimental process and problem-solving skills through smartphone-based VR simulations

learning_goals: Through cognitive task analysis (CTA), learners can identify core cognitive stages of science experiments with 80% accuracy.
In simulation/VR environments, learners can replicate expert-level thinking processes in science problem-solving with at least 70% accuracy.
Using CTA-based feedback, learners can reduce experimental design errors by at least 60%.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
